info.name: ZZZZ Flickr - Small Justified (Compact) v.4
info.description: IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey NEW: I don't like this justified view.... Too big (and too slow)! This Userstyle make it smaller /compact. ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)
info.additionalInfo: What's does this Userstyles: - (NEW v.4): Reduce the TOP Header (Delete the Cover photo etc... Include "NEW GLOBAL NAVBAR only visble on Hover" - Add Paginator Always visible on the left side... - Rows Counter - Metas Adapted - Color correction Read here my request in Greasemonkey forum about this Damn Justified View: Flickr Thumbnail (30.07.2013) : How to change the JUSTIFED view on to the old way (small etc..) [USO mirror] In addition in it : - Many links related at this JUSTIFIED view. - A copy of the Flickr/yahoo scripts running on the pool (small view) page before their last change of 29.07.2013 IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey - For Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - DACKR Viewer ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewer) - FFFLCKR (fffflckr) ▶ You Can Find Many Other Updated Infos About Flickr Extensions / Userscripts / Userstyles / Applications.. In : ► My BIG List (After New Photo Page Design (2015) - Updated. ▷ Thumbnail Preview With: ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus( Firefox Addon) Very Good addon to use on many sites too.
